segments.source_content: ## Chaosd introduction

translations.zh-hant: ## Chaosd 簡介

segments.source_content: [Chaosd](https://github.com/chaos-mesh/chaosd) is a Chaos Engineering testing tool provided by Chaos Mesh. You need to download and deploy it separately (see [Download and deploy](#download-and-deploy)). It is used to inject faults into physical machine environments and also recover faults.

translations.zh-hant: [Chaosd](https://github.com/chaos-mesh/chaosd) 是由 Chaos Mesh 提供的混沌工程測試工具。您需要單獨下載和部署（參見[下載與部署](#download-and-deploy)）。它用於在實體機環境中注入故障並恢復故障。

segments.source_content: Chaosd has the following core strengths:

translations.zh-hant: Chaosd 具有以下核心優勢：

segments.source_content: - Easy-to-use: You only need to execute simple commands in Chaosd to create and manage Chaos experiments.

translations.zh-hant: - 易於使用：您只需在 Chaosd 中執行簡單命令即可建立和管理混沌實驗。

segments.source_content: - Various fault types: Chaosd provides various fault types to be injected into physical machines at different levels, including process, network, pressure, disk, host, etc. More fault types are to be added.

translations.zh-hant: - 多樣化故障類型：Chaosd 提供可在不同層級注入實體機的多種故障類型，包括程序、網路、壓力、磁碟、主機等。更多故障類型將持續新增。

segments.source_content: - Multiple work modes: Chaosd can be used both as a command-line tool and as a service to meet the needs of different scenarios.

translations.zh-hant: - 多種工作模式：Chaosd 既可作為命令列工具使用，也可作為服務運行，滿足不同場景需求。

segments.source_content: ### Supported fault types

translations.zh-hant: ### 支援的故障類型

segments.source_content: You can use Chaosd to simulate the following fault types:

translations.zh-hant: 您可使用 Chaosd 模擬以下故障類型：

segments.source_content: - Process: Injects faults into the processes. Operations such as killing the process or stopping the process are supported.

translations.zh-hant: - 程序：向程序中注入故障。支援殺死程序或停止程序等操作。

segments.source_content: - Network: Injects faults into the network of physical machines. Operations such as increasing network latency, losing packets, and corrupting packets are supported.

translations.zh-hant: - 網路：向實體機的網路中注入故障。支援增加網路延遲、封包遺失和封包損壞等操作。

segments.source_content: - Pressure: Injects pressure on the CPU or memory of the physical machines.

translations.zh-hant: - 壓力：對實體機的 CPU 或記憶體施加壓力。

segments.source_content: - Disk: Injects faults into disks of the physical machines. Operations such as increasing disk load of reads and writes, and filling disks are supported.

translations.zh-hant: - 磁碟：向實體機的磁碟中注入故障。支援增加讀寫磁碟負載及填滿磁碟等操作。

segments.source_content: - Host: Injects faults into the physical machine. Operations such as shutdown the physical machine are supported.

translations.zh-hant: - 主機：向實體機注入故障。支援關閉實體機等操作。

segments.source_content: For details about the introduction and usage of each fault type, refer to the related documentation.

translations.zh-hant: 有關各故障類型的詳細介紹與用法，請參閱相關文件。

segments.source_content: ### Operating environment

translations.zh-hant: ### 運行環境

segments.source_content: Your glibc version must be v2.17 or later versions.

translations.zh-hant: 您的 glibc 版本必須為 v2.17 或更高版本。

segments.source_content: ### Download and deploy

translations.zh-hant: ### 下載與部署

segments.source_content:
1. Set the version of Chaosd to be downloaded as the environment variable. For example, v1.0.0:

   ```bash
   export CHAOSD_VERSION=v1.0.0
   ```

   To view all released versions of Chaosd, refer to [releases](https://github.com/chaos-mesh/chaosd/releases).

   To download the latest version (not stable), use `latest`:

   ```bash
   export CHAOSD_VERSION=latest
   ```

translations.zh-hant:
1. 設定要下載的 Chaosd 版本為環境變數。例如 v1.0.0：

   ```bash
   export CHAOSD_VERSION=v1.0.0
   ```

   查看所有已發布的 Chaosd 版本，請參閱 [releases](https://github.com/chaos-mesh/chaosd/releases)。

   若要下載最新版本（非穩定版），請使用 `latest`：

   ```bash
   export CHAOSD_VERSION=latest
   ```

segments.source_content:
2. Download Chaosd:

   ```bash
   curl -fsSLO https://mirrors.chaos-mesh.org/chaosd-$CHAOSD_VERSION-linux-amd64.tar.gz
   ```

translations.zh-hant:
2. 下載 Chaosd：

   ```bash
   curl -fsSLO https://mirrors.chaos-mesh.org/chaosd-$CHAOSD_VERSION-linux-amd64.tar.gz
   ```

segments.source_content:
3. Unzip the Chaosd file and move it to the `/usr/local` directory:

   ```bash
   tar zxvf chaosd-$CHAOSD_VERSION-linux-amd64.tar.gz && sudo mv chaosd-$CHAOSD_VERSION-linux-amd64 /usr/local/
   ```

translations.zh-hant:
3. 解壓 Chaosd 文件並移至 `/usr/local` 目錄：

   ```bash
   tar zxvf chaosd-$CHAOSD_VERSION-linux-amd64.tar.gz && sudo mv chaosd-$CHAOSD_VERSION-linux-amd64 /usr/local/
   ```

segments.source_content:
4. Add the Chaosd directory to the `PATH` environment variable:

   ```bash
   export PATH=/usr/local/chaosd-$CHAOSD_VERSION-linux-amd64:$PATH
   ```

translations.zh-hant:
4. 將 Chaosd 目錄加入 `PATH` 環境變數：

   ```bash
   export PATH=/usr/local/chaosd-$CHAOSD_VERSION-linux-amd64:$PATH
   ```

segments.source_content: ### Work modes

translations.zh-hant: ### 工作模式

segments.source_content: You can use Chaosd in the following modes:

translations.zh-hant: 您可在以下模式中使用 Chaosd：

segments.source_content: - Command-line mode: Run Chaosd directly as a command-line tool to inject and recover faults.

translations.zh-hant: - 命令列模式：直接將 Chaosd 作為命令列工具運行，注入和恢復故障。

segments.source_content: - Service mode: Run Chaosd as a service in the background, to inject and recover faults by sending HTTP requests.

translations.zh-hant: - 服務模式：將 Chaosd 作為後台服務運行，通過發送 HTTP 請求來注入和恢復故障。
